question: Who will launch Amma Two-wheeler Scheme in Chennai?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit Chennai and launch the Tamil Nadu government's Amma Two-wheeler Scheme. The scheme of providing 50 percent subsidy to working women to buy two-wheelers is a pet project of late Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa and is being launched on her birth anniversary. He will visit Daman, Chennai, Puducherry, and Gujarat in the next two days. He will arrive in Daman today to launch various development projects and hand over certificates to beneficiaries of various schemes. He will also address a public meeting. From there, Mr. Modi will travel to Chennai to inaugurate the Amma Two-wheeler Scheme. Tomorrow, the Prime Minister will visit Puducherry. He will offer floral tributes to Shri Aurobindo at Aurobindo Ashram, and interact with students of Sri Aurobindo International Centre of Education.
